CustomProfile.Description: Super Alpine Racer revitalizes the classic Alpine Racer series with new characters and redesigned courses. A towering 55‑inch vertical HD monitor and a multi‑pivot ski platform put players in a downhill slalom, while built‑in air blowers simulate wind and multicolored LEDs light up the cabinet. Ski through gates to gain speed boosts and perform aerial tricks for extra points in this high‑energy simulation.
